name: Paracetamol
description: Used to relieve mild to moderate pain and reduce fever, commonly used for headaches, muscle aches, colds, and flu.

name: Dolo 650
description: Commonly used for reducing fever and relieving pain associated with colds, viral infections, and body aches.

name: Amoxicillin
description: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as pneumonia, throat infections, ear infections, and urinary tract infections.

name: Ibuprofen
description: A pain reliever and anti-inflammatory drug used for headaches, arthritis, muscle pain, and menstrual cramps.

name: Azithromycin
description: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections such as bronchitis, pneumonia, sinus infections, and skin infections.

name: Pantoprazole
description: Used to treat acid reflux, GERD, and stomach ulcers by reducing stomach acid production.

name: Metformin
description: A medication used to control blood sugar levels in people with type 2 diabetes.

name: Losartan
description: Used to lower high blood pressure and reduce the risk of stroke in patients with heart disease.

name: Amlodipine
description: A calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain (angina).

name: Cetirizine
description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms such as runny nose, sneezing, and itchy eyes.

name: Clopidogrel
description: Clopidogrel is an antiplatelet medication used to prevent heart attacks and strokes.

name: Lorazepam
description: Lorazepam is a benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety disorders and insomnia.

name: Ranitidine
description: Ranitidine is a medication that reduces stomach acid production, used for acid reflux and ulcers.

name: Levothyroxine
description: Levothyroxine is a thyroid hormone replacement used to treat hypothyroidism.

name: Doxycycline
description: Doxycycline is an antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections, including acne and respiratory infections.

name: Salbutamol
description: Salbutamol is a bronchodilator used to treat asthma and other breathing disorders.

name: Ondansetron
description: Ondansetron is used to prevent nausea and vomiting caused by chemotherapy and surgery.

name: Prednisolone
description: Prednisolone is a corticosteroid used to treat inflammation, allergies, and autoimmune disorders.

name: Chloroquine
description: Chloroquine is an antimalarial drug also used to treat autoimmune diseases like lupus.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: Hydrochlorothiazide is a diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.

name: Vitamin D3
description: Supports bone health and immune function.

name: Atorvastatin
description: Lowers cholesterol and reduces heart disease risk.

name: Metoprolol
description: Used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.

name: Dexamethasone
description: A corticosteroid used to reduce inflammation.

name: Furosemide
description: A diuretic used to treat fluid retention and high blood pressure.

name: Ciprofloxacin
description: An antibiotic used to treat bacterial infections.

name: Gliclazide
description: Used to control blood sugar levels in type 2 diabetes.

name: Rifampicin
description: An antibiotic used to treat tuberculosis and other infections.

name: Prednisone
description: A corticosteroid used to treat allergic and inflammatory conditions.

name: Bromhexine
description: A mucolytic agent that helps clear mucus from the lungs.

name: Mometasone
description: A corticosteroid used to treat skin conditions and allergies.

name: Sildenafil
description: Used to treat erectile dysfunction and pulmonary hypertension.

name: Lisinopril
description: An ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure.

name: Tamsulosin
description: Used to treat symptoms of an enlarged prostate.

name: Bupropion
description: An antidepressant used to treat depression and smoking cessation.

name: Loratadine
description: An antihistamine used to treat allergies and hay fever.

name: Naproxen
description: A pain reliever used to treat inflammation and arthritis.

name: Flunil-10 (Fluoxetine)
description: An antidepressant used to treat depression and anxiety.

name: Chlorpheniramine
description: An antihistamine used to relieve allergy symptoms.

name: Nitroglycerin
description: Used to treat chest pain (angina) and heart conditions.

name: Zinco Boost
description: A zinc supplement that supports immune health.
